Summary: Saw two pairs of red/orange lights in night sky.
divs: sighting detailssaw two pairs of reddish orange lights in night sky south east of my house moving south west ,as i was locking up my shed on that cold night very high in the sky id say 5-10k feet in the sky static in color not blinking or pulsing was amazed &interested watched carefully for 10mins make sure was not a satellite or plane then went inside cause it was freezing out and told my wife who laughed at me, and that was that till i saw, a video on youtube of the same thing i saw http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=2n9oa62lem0&feature=channel_page
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Bristol
There were no other sightings in Bristol on or around December 5th 2008
